ghostPost.title: BC Bike Race
ghostPost.excerpt: I'm looking for a MTB stage race to participate in for several weeks now. Just today I stumbled upon the BC Bike Race in British Columbia, Canada. And they have this awesome movie on their website.
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: I'm looking for a MTB stage race to participate in for several weeks now. Just today I stumbled upon the BC Bike Race in British Columbia, Canada. And they have this awesome movie on their website.
ghostPost.plaintext:
I'm looking for a MTB stage race to participate in for several weeks now. Just
today I stumbled upon the BC Bike Race [https://www.bcbikerace.com]  in British
Columbia, Canada. And they have this awesome movie on their website.

For 2019 I'm too late, but I maybe I can fit in next year!



Title photo via ActiveSteve [https://flic.kr/p/8LsCfT].
ghostPost.html:
I'm looking for a MTB stage race to participate in for several weeks now. Just today I stumbled upon the BC Bike Race in British Columbia, Canada. And they have this awesome movie on their website.

For 2019 I'm too late, but I maybe I can fit in next year!

Title photo via ActiveSteve.
